duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide one-to-one instruction in Math and Science to elementary, middle, or high school aged students.
Utilize prepared and individualized lesson plans for students, reducing grading and planning time outside of classroom hours.
Collaborate with the Campus Director to set a flexible schedule based on availability and open class slots.
Meet students individually, understanding their learning styles and assisting in developing better learning strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in subject area of expertise
